channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Level Up

item.title: How the COVID-19 pandemic has impacted Toronto and what can we do for the future
item.description: Abstract In this study, we looked at the areas in Toronto where the COVID-19 virus has hit the hardest and explore the demographic of the population affected by the virus. We found that men and women are equally likely to die as a result of the virus and that the number of older people to die from the virus is significantly high . We also find that neighbourhoods such as Rouge and York University Heights have been one of the most impacted areas in Toronto due to the virus.
